reviewText: Hanks and Sinese were absolutely excellent.  Caught this movie on a regular channel.  So many commercials that I decided to purchase the DVD.  Glad I did.  This is a movie that anyone with a heart won't be able to move from the TV.
Nephew loved it.
Gave it as a gift.
Favorite "Movie for The Family"
thank you
The best movie I have ever seen. It leaves you a message for living.

Our view of people is somewhat distorted at times.  I found this a sweet story of a loving mother bringing up her boy, alone, and doing such a good job.  I can watch this over and over and never get tired of it.  Alkest B. Allen

My second favorite movie (after Dirty Dancing). Bought it to celebrate my birthday and I don't regret it one bit! I love this movie and how it helps me embrace the precious moments of life just a little more. The movie came in great shape and I still have it, 2 and a half years later!
